contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21st day of August, 2012, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The order of the Superi- or Court is VACATED. This matter is REMANDED to the Superior Court for it to reconsider the matter in light of our decision in Commonwealth v. Harris, 32 A.3d 243 (Pa.2011).
